price: ߡߍ߲ ߠߎ߬ ߕߍ߫ ߖߞߊ ߘߌ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߏ߬ ߟߎ߫ ߟߋ߫ ߓߊ߲߬ߣߍ߲߫ ߛߎ߬ߟߊ߬ߞߏ ߡߊ߬
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤۡتُونَ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَهُم بِٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ هُمۡ كَٰفِرُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna lā yu'tūna al-zakata wahum bil-ākhirati hum kāfirūna
